segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself is a two-step model, but it looks utterly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it's leaning backward at a concerning angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching for the cookie jar inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension as he balances there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could easily tip over backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the cookies he's grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is oblivious to the danger, only focused on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a really risky maneuver just for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm honestly quite surprised the woman hasn't heard the stool creaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a potential accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell out and tell him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
